skills.name: Unseen Threat
skills.blurb: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kha'Zix''' gains ''Unseen Threat'' whenever the enemy loses {{tip|sight}} of him or he activates {{ai|Void Assault|Kha'Zix}}. ''Unseen Threat'' causes his next [[basic attack]] against an enemy champion to deal {{pp|14 to 116|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{tip|slow}} them by 25% for 2 seconds. Once gained, the empowered attack lasts until used.
skills.descriptionHtml: Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses sight of him or he activates Kha'Zix's Void Assault. Unseen Threat causes his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14undefined âˆ’ 116undefined (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and slow them by 25% for 2 seconds. Once gained, the empowered attack lasts until used.
skills.notes:
* Any form of vision loss may trigger ''Unseen Threat'', such as {{ai|Curse of the Black Mist|Senna}}, {{tip|nearsight}} and {{ai|Brushmaker|Ivern}}.
* {{ai|Void Assault|Kha'Zix}} grants ''Unseen Threat'' even if '''Kha'Zix''' never becomes unseen (e.g. affected by {{tip|true sight}}).
** Other {{tip|stealth}} such as {{cai|E|Senna}} and {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}} does not do this.
* Both the attack's damage and bonus spell damage are grouped under the same Spell ID.
** Because of this, a single ''Unseen Threat'' attack does '''not''' trigger two {{ri|Electrocute}} stacks.

skills.name: Taste Their Fear
skills.blurb: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kha'Zix''' considers any enemy unit to be {{as|Isolated|buzzword}} if they are not nearby to one of their allies. {{ai|Taste Their Fear|Kha'Zix}}, {{ai|Evolved Reaper Claws|Kha'Zix}}, and {{ai|Evolved Spike Racks|Kha'Zix}} have special interactions against {{as|Isolated|buzzword}} targets.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' slashes the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, increased by 110% against {{as|Isolated|buzzword}} targets.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit to be Isolated if they are not nearby to one of their allies. Kha'Zix's Taste Their Fear, Kha'Zix's Evolved Reaper Claws, and Kha'Zix's Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.
Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing them physical damage, increased by 110% against Isolated targets.
leveling: {{st|Physical damage|{{ap|60 to 160}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Isolation Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2.1 to 160*2.1}} {{as|(+ {{ap|130*2.1}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical damage: (+ 130% bonus AD)
  • Isolation Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

skills.name: Evolved Reaper Claws
description: {{sbc|Passive - Evolved Reaper Claws:}} '''Kha'Zix''' gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} on his [[basic attack]]s and ''Taste Their Fear''.
If the target is {{as|Isolated|buzzword}}, the cooldown is {{sti|cooldown|reduced}} by 45%.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Evolved Reaper Claws: Kha'Zix gains 50 bonus range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
If the target is Isolated, the cooldown is reduced by 45%.

skills.name: Void Spike
skills.blurb: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' fires a cluster of spikes in a line in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within the area.
'''Kha'Zix''' {{tip|heals}} himself if he is within the detonation radius.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kha'Zix fires a cluster of spikes in a line in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies within the area.
Kha'Zix heals himself if he is within the detonation radius.
skills.notes:
* ''Void Spike'' will cast from wherever '''Kha'Zix''' is at the end of the cast time.
* ''Void Spike's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.

skills.name: Evolved Spike Racks
skills.angle: {{tt|X{{degree}}|Right and left missiles at (X/2)Â° to their side, respectively}}
description: {{sbc|Passive - Evolved Spike Racks:}} ''Void Spike'' fires three clusters in a cone, {{tip|slow|slows}} by 60% and {{tip|sight|reveals}} enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide '''Kha'Zix''' with additional healing.
{{as|Isolated|buzzword}} targets hit by ''Evolved Spike Racks'' are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% instead.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three clusters in a cone, slows by 60% and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.
Isolated targets hit by Evolved Spike Racks are slowed by 90% instead.
skills.notes:
* ''Evolved Spike Racks'' will cast from wherever '''Kha'Zix''' is at the end of the cast time.
* ''Evolved Spike Racks''' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|sight|reveal}}.

skills.name: Leap
skills.blurb: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies upon landing.
{{ai|Taste Their Fear|Kha'Zix}} can be used during ''Leap''.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kha'Zix leaps to the target location, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
Kha'Zix's Taste Their Fear can be used during Leap.
skills.notes: * '''Kha'Zix''' can use his [[summoner spells]] and [[active ability items|item actives]] while {{tip|dash|leaping}}.

skills.name: Evolved Wings
description: {{sbc|Passive - Evolved Wings:}} ''Leap'' gains 200 increased range and its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset on enemy champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}}.
skills.descriptionHtml: Passive - Evolved Wings: Leap gains 200 increased range and its cooldown is reset on enemy champion takedowns.
skills.notes: * '''Kha'Zix''' can use his [[summoner spells]] and [[active ability items|item actives]] while {{tip|dash|leaping}}.

skills.name: Void Assault
skills.blurb: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Each rank in ''Void Assault'' allows '''Kha'Zix''' to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Choosing an ability initiates a 2 second [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]], during which '''Kha'Zix''' advances his form, receiving the evolution once it completes.
'''Kha'Zix''' cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kha'Zix''' becomes {{tip|invisible}} for {{ap|1.25}} seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while stealthed.
After 2 seconds of leaving {{tip|invisibility}}, and for the next 10 seconds, ''Void Assault'' can be cast a second time at no additional cost.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Choosing an ability initiates a 2 second Channel#Casting Times, during which Kha'Zix advances his form, receiving the evolution once it completes.
Kha'Zix cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.
Active: Kha'Zix becomes invisible for seconds, gaining 40% bonus movement speed while stealthed.
After 2 seconds of leaving invisibility, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be cast a second time at no additional cost.
Recast: Kha'Zix mimics the first cast's effects.
skills.notes:
*Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* '''Kha'Zix''' receives the evolution even if he dies while in cast time.
* Every time ''Void Assault'' is ranked, a secondary menu will pop up for '''Kha'Zix''' to select an ability to evolve, this can only be done once per ability.
** The only way for '''Kha'Zix''' to evolve all of his abilities is to gain the fourth evolution point by being victorious in [[The Hunt is On!]] (by scoring a {{tip|takedown}} on {{ci|Rengar}}).

skills.name: Evolved Adaptive Cloaking
description: {{sbc|Passive - Evolved Adaptive Cloaking:}} Increases the {{tip|invisibility}} duration to 2 seconds, and can be cast up to 3 times.
skills.descriptionHtml: Passive - Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: Increases the invisibility duration to 2 seconds, and can be cast up to 3 times.
